artist_development.name: Artist Development
artist_development.description: Comprehensive artist development programs to nurture talent and build successful, sustainable music careers.
features: Career Planning - Strategic roadmap for long-term success
Brand Development - Building authentic artist identity
Performance Training - Coaching for live performances
Marketing Strategy - Comprehensive promotional planning

music_production.name: Music Production
music_production.description: State-of-the-art production facilities with world-class producers, engineers, and cutting-edge technology.
features: Recording Studios - Professional recording environments
Mixing & Mastering - Industry-standard audio engineering
Production Services - Collaboration with top producers
Sound Design - Creative audio manipulation and effects

global_distribution.name: Global Distribution
global_distribution.description: Worldwide distribution network to get your music to every major platform and reach millions of listeners.
features: Digital Distribution - All major streaming platforms
Physical Releases - CD and vinyl distribution
Playlist Placement - Strategic playlist pitching
International Marketing - Multi-territory campaigns

publishing_rights.name: Publishing & Rights Management
publishing_rights.description: Complete music publishing services including copyright protection, royalty collection, and licensing.
features: Copyright Registration - Protecting your intellectual property
Royalty Management - Tracking and collecting all revenue streams
Sync Licensing - Opportunities in TV, film, commercials, and games
Publishing Administration - Professional rights management

marketing_promotion.name: Marketing & Promotion
marketing_promotion.description: Strategic marketing campaigns and promotional services to maximize your music's reach and impact.
features: Social Media Marketing - Comprehensive social strategy
PR Campaigns - Press coverage and media relations
Radio Promotion - Traditional and digital radio
Influencer Partnerships - Collaborations with key influencers
Content Creation - Music videos and promotional materials
Email Marketing - Direct fan engagement

career_management.name: Career Management
career_management.description: Personalized career management and strategic guidance to navigate the music industry successfully.
features: Contract Negotiation - Fair and transparent agreements
Tour Management - Booking and logistics support
Brand Partnerships - Commercial opportunities
Long-term Strategy - Sustainable career planning
